main event: On April 4, 1967, three witnesses observed an unidentified object in Youngstown, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was white with a light blue haze around it in the early morning light., The object seemed to appear as a flash before disappearing behind a building., The witnesses indicated the object moved silently and was estimated to be about 20-30 miles per hour., The object was estimated to be about 50 yards away from the witnesses when observed., One witness described the size of the object as being covered by about half a match stick.
witness description: young observers including at least one 13-year-old boy
